name: The Adventures of Squeak and Noodle
name_original: The Adventures of Squeak and Noodle
description: 1080p REQUIRED. The game engine is limited to a single set resolution. WASD, Spacebar. and "E" are the only controls. This is a game I worked on in 2019. I ported it to a new engine and am working to update it at the pace of that one pitch drip the science community has been watching for forever. This is not a serious project anymore and should not be taken seriously.
